response.original_title: Classic Game Room 20th Anniversary Retro Spectacular
response.overview: Banished from time, space, reality, Earth and the Internet, Classic Game Room resumes its never-ending mission to review everything from the Intergalactic Space Arcade. Enjoy video game reviews the way they used to be; fun, quirky, and laugh out loud funny.  Mark brings back the old school CGR style with 120 minutes of all-new 2019-produced reviews celebrating two decades of Classic Game Room!  Review List:  1. Darth Vader Atari 2600  2. Human Cannonball – Atari 2600  3. Gunstar Heroes – Sega Genesis  4. Akira Psycho Ball – PlayStation 2  5. Zanac X Zanac – PlayStation  6. Magnavox Odyssey 2 Voice  7. Type & Tell – Odyssey 2  8. Tatsujin – PC-Engine  9. Dead Or Alive 6 – PS4  10. Power Stone 2 – Dreamcast  11. Space Wars – Vectrex  12. Fire Emblem Warriors – Switch  13. Killer Bees! – Odyssey 2  14. RayCrisis – PlayStation  15. Bally Astrocade  16. The Fantastic Wizard – Astrocade  17. Earth Defense Force: Iron Rain  18. [REDACTED]
response.tagline: Do you like Classic Game Room? Then more Classic Game Room!
response.title: Classic Game Room 20th Anniversary Retro Spectacular
